thread.title: Leading Tech Repair Brand, uBreakiFix, Opens In Parker
thread.title_full: Leading Tech Repair Brand, uBreakiFix, Opens In Parker

author: admin
title: Leading Tech Repair Brand, uBreakiFix, Opens In Parker
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/19/2015 @ 7:11 AM   uBreakiFix 
PARKER, Colo., Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- uBreakiFix specializes in same-day repair service of small electronics, repairing cracked screens, water damage, software issues, camera issues and other technical problems at its more than 130 stores nationwide. Its newest location, uBreakiFix Parker , opened Oct. 19 at 11211 Dransfeldt Rd. 
uBreakiFix has saved Americans an estimated $500 million in replacement costs since its inception in 2009 and has an average repair cost for electronics of $85. The company is known for its timely service and hassle-free customer experience, and offers repair services for all brands of smartphones, tablets, computers, game consoles and more. Each repair comes with a 90-day warranty. 
This is the first uBreakiFix franchise location for owner, Brandon Best. He is passionate about bringing the highest quality technology repair option to the community and looks forward to helping customers find solutions for all their technology needs. 
"Whether we are recovering precious pictures from a water damaged phone or providing advice to help someone connect to their home network, I want uBreakiFix to be a resource for the Parker community," Best said. "We want to take care of everyone coming through our doors by providing solutions that matter to our customers." 
On May 19, 2015, uBreakiFix repaired its one-millionth device. By 2016, the brand expects to have 175 stores across North America. WHERE: uBreakiFix Parker 11211 Dransfeldt Rd., Ste. 161 Parker, Colo., 80134 
For more information and to view a service menu, visit ubreakifix.com. 
About uBreakiFix Founded in 2009, uBreakiFix specializes in the repair of small electronics, ranging from smartphones, game consoles, tablets, computers and everything in between. Cracked screens, water damage, software issues, camera issues, and most any other problem can be repaired by visiting a uBreakiFix store across the U.S. and in Canada. For more information, visit ubreakifix.com .
